title: What are servers and what are the latest server technologies? - Quora

response.answer_text: In a technical term, a Server is a computer program. It accepts and responds to request which is made by another program known as the client. It manages all network resources. Generally, servers are dedicated which means they perform no other task except their server task. Most of the servers never stop their services because they used to deliver services for some constantly required server. The server fails causes so many problems to network users and companies. So commonly server is set to be fault tolerant. The latest server technologies are: Artificial Intelligence (AI)5G NetworksCloud ComputingMobile ComputingBlockchainAugmented AnalyticsDigital twin Technology
